net.floodlightcontroller.staticentry

Class StaticEntries

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.staticentry.StaticEntries

  • public class StaticEntries
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents static entries to be maintained by the controller on the switches.

      Turns a JSON formatted Static Flow Pusher string into a storage entry Expects a string in JSON along the lines of: { "switch": "AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF:00:11", "name": "flow-mod-1", "cookie": "0", "priority": "32768", "in_port": "1", "actions": "output=2", }

      • flowModToStorageEntry

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> flowModToStorageEntry(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFFlowMod fm,
                                                                                     java.lang.String sw,
                                                                                     java.lang.String name)
                                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Parses an OFFlowMod (and it's inner Match) to the storage entry format.
        Parameters:
        fm - The FlowMod to parse
        sw - The switch the FlowMod is going to be installed on
        name - The name of this static flow entry
        Returns:
        A Map representation of the storage entry
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • jsonToStorageEntry

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> jsonToStorageEntry(java.lang.String fmJson)
                                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Turns a JSON formatted Static Flow Pusher string into a storage entry Expects a string in JSON along the lines of: { "switch": "AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF:00:11", "name": "flow-mod-1", "cookie": "0", "priority": "32768", "in_port": "1", "actions": "output=2", }
        Parameters:
        fmJson - The JSON formatted static flow pusher entry
        Returns:
        The map of the storage entry
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was an error parsing the JSON
